column1: The RSGS provides expedition funding and/or approval to various schools, universities, and other organisations as part of its support for education in geography. &nbsp
column2: Reports from these expeditions, and some others which have not received RSGS funding or approval, are collected at RSGS headquarters for information purposes, where they are available, for consultation by prior arrangement, to interested parties. &nbsp
column3: Reports are listed here by geographical area, each of which can be accessed by clicking on the appropriate image or caption below: -

column1: North America
Central America
South America
Please note that Iceland reports are included with those for Europe
